body:
{"resume": "data:text/plain;base64,", "jobDescription": "Senior Full Stack Engineer - Remote Opportunity

Company: InnovateTech Solutions
Location: Remote (US-based)
Salary: 40,000 - 80,000 + equity

ABOUT THE ROLE:
We are seeking an exceptional Senior Full Stack Engineer to join our rapidly growing engineering team. You will be responsible for designing, developing, and maintaining scalable web applications that serve millions of users worldwide. This is a unique opportunity to work with cutting-edge technologies while making a significant impact on our product and company growth.

REQUIRED QUALIFICATIONS:
• 5+ years of professional software development experience
• Expert-level proficiency in JavaScript/TypeScript and modern frameworks (React, Vue.js, or Angular)
• Strong backend development experience with Node.js, Python, or Java
• Extensive experience with cloud platforms, particularly AWS (Lambda, S3, DynamoDB, API Gateway)
• Proficiency in database design and optimization (SQL and NoSQL)
• Experience with microservices architecture and distributed systems
• Strong understanding of CI/CD pipelines and DevOps practices
• Experience with containerization technologies (Docker, Kubernetes)
• Excellent problem-solving skills and attention to detail
• Strong communication skills and ability to work in a collaborative environment

PREFERRED QUALIFICATIONS:
• Experience with serverless architecture and AWS Lambda
• Knowledge of GraphQL and modern API design patterns
• Experience with real-time applications and WebSocket technologies
• Background in performance optimization and scalability
• Experience mentoring junior developers
• Contributions to open-source projects
• AWS certifications (Solutions Architect, Developer, or DevOps)
• Experience with infrastructure as code (Terraform, CloudFormation)

RESPONSIBILITIES:
• Design and develop high-quality, scalable web applications
• Collaborate with product managers, designers, and other engineers to deliver features
• Write clean, maintainable, and well-tested code
• Participate in code reviews and provide constructive feedback
• Optimize application performance and ensure scalability
• Mentor junior team members and contribute to technical decision-making
• Stay up-to-date with emerging technologies and industry best practices
• Participate in on-call rotation and incident response
• Contribute to architectural decisions and technical roadmap planning

WHAT WE OFFER:
• Competitive salary and equity package
• Comprehensive health, dental, and vision insurance
• Flexible PTO and work-from-home policy
• Professional development budget (,000 annually)
• Latest MacBook Pro and home office setup allowance
• Annual company retreats and team building events
• Opportunity to work with a talented, passionate team
• Significant growth opportunities in a fast-scaling company

TECH STACK:
• Frontend: React, TypeScript, Material-UI, Redux
• Backend: Node.js, Express, Python, Django
• Cloud: AWS (Lambda, S3, DynamoDB, API Gateway, CloudFormation)
• Databases: PostgreSQL, MongoDB, Redis
• DevOps: Docker, Kubernetes, Jenkins, Terraform
• Monitoring: DataDog, CloudWatch, Sentry
• Version Control: Git, GitHub

If you're passionate about building world-class software and want to make a meaningful impact, we'd love to hear from you!", "outputFormat": "word"}
